description: Decadent chocolate buttercream is layered between chocolate cake, then topped with a chocolate glaze. It's a stunning dessert that's sure to impress.
name: Chocolate Stout Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Level tops of cakes, then halve horizontally. Place 1 cake layer on a plate. Top with one-third of the buttercream. Repeat layering with cake and buttercream. Pour glaze over top of cake, allowing it to drip down sides. Serve.
